question: 照れる
sourceMnemonic: If you <kanji>illuminate</kanji> the things I've done, I start <vocabulary>to feel embarrassed</vocabulary>. Please don't embarrass me. :(
sourceReadingMnemonic: Since this word consists of a kanji with hiragana attached, you can bet that it will use the kun'yomi reading. You didn't learn that reading with this kanji, so here's a mnemonic to help you: The thing you feel the most embarrassed about is your <ja><reading>手</reading></ja> (<ja>て</ja>). It's all blue and scary looking.
